text: For every complex problem there is an answer that is clear, simple, and wrong.
author: H. L. Mencken

text: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.

author: John Muir

text: I never found a companion that was so companionable as solitude.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: This world is but a canvas to our imagination.
author: Henry David Thoreau

author: Henry David Thoreau

text: May your trails be crooked, winding, lonesome, dangerous, leading to the most amazing view. May your mountains rise into and above the clouds.
author: Edward Abbey

author: Henry David Thoreau

author: Henry David Thoreau

text: If a man constantly aspires is he not elevated?

author: Benjamin Graham

author: Immanuel Kant

text: Know the rules well, so you can break them effectively.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

author: Carl Sagan

author: Carl Sagan
